text: Gu Zon, gu nde phorga guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma ma. Gu nde phorgap, nza Zisas ntɨɨri ma. Gu khurkhum nde khuav, simtɨgi gu zaagi ndi. Gu nde phorgap, nza Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi garim, nza ana piin ki. Nza za wari tɨga thivgia havhargiap, simtɨgi ndi. Gu Fhe Bakɨmen buna vhuueŋ bun nzuav, gu khaŋ nzuai, “Gu Zisas khothɨgi.” Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe panan na kegap, na ndi kha rɨgɨkɨrige tɨgi, mba rɨgɨkɨrige, mbe kha zɨn niŋge rɨgi, Patmos. 1.9 Fhum mbe Romiŋ, mba mbe vuzvugi tɨvi zɨn vui fhuv gumgi, mbe mbe suigap, mbe ndi phena tɨvneŋ ga sui. Mbe tugi mbarir, mbe mbe sasarigim, mbe vov rɨgikɨriviger ki. Patmos, ana mba phena tɨvanen ki gumgi ki rɨgakɨra mbige ma.
